Description.Text: Hotel Verite is conveniently located in the popular Chelsea area. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Facilities for disabled guests, business center, restaurant, laundry service, concierge are just some of the facilities on offer. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all New York (NY) has to offer by making Hotel Verite your base.
